function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Insufficient control over the distribution of the grid may limit the practical scope of quarantine measures.","Unrestricted contact between people within the grid boundaries before quarantine implementation.","Ineffective hospital isolation measures leading to a large number of undetected or ineffectively quarantined cases.","Shortage of medical beds","Inadequate home quarantine measures","Inadequate supply of face masks","Ineffective quarantine measures","Large-scale research and development efforts for vaccines and treatments","Potential security and privacy risks in the use of digital technologies","Reliance on iot tools for disease monitoring may lead to false alarms or missed cases","Incorrect interpretation of iot data may lead to misinformed decision-making"]}
